content:
DsmlSoapHttpConnection Class

Definition

The DsmlSoapHttpConnection class represents a connection to a DSML Gateway using SOAP over HTTP.

In this Article

public class DsmlSoapHttpConnection : System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapConnection
Inheritance
Object
DirectoryConnection
DsmlSoapConnection
DsmlSoapHttpConnection

Inherited Members

ClientCertificates
Credential
Directory
SoapRequestHeader

Constructors

DsmlSoapHttpConnection(DsmlDirectoryIdentifier)

The DsmlSoapHttpConnection constructor initializes a new instance of a DsmlSoapHttpConnection class.

public DsmlSoapHttpConnection (System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier identifier);
Parameters
identifier
DsmlDirectoryIdentifier

A DsmlDirectoryIdentifier object that specifies server for the connection.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

identifier is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

DsmlSoapHttpConnection(Uri)

The DsmlSoapHttpConnection constructor initializes a new instance of a DsmlSoapHttpConnection class.

public DsmlSoapHttpConnection (Uri uri);
Parameters
uri
Uri

A Uri object that specifies server for the connection.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

uri is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

DsmlSoapHttpConnection(DsmlDirectoryIdentifier, NetworkCredential)

The DsmlSoapHttpConnection constructor initializes a new instance of a DsmlSoapHttpConnection class.

public DsmlSoapHttpConnection (System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier identifier, System.Net.NetworkCredential credential);
Parameters
identifier
DsmlDirectoryIdentifier

A DsmlDirectoryIdentifier object that specifies server for the connection.

credential
NetworkCredential

A NetworkCredential object that contains the network credentials.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

identifier is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

DsmlSoapHttpConnection(DsmlDirectoryIdentifier, NetworkCredential, AuthType)

The DsmlSoapHttpConnection constructor creates and initializes a new instance of a DsmlSoapHttpConnection class using the specified identifier, network credentials, and authentication type.

public DsmlSoapHttpConnection (System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier identifier, System.Net.NetworkCredential credential, System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType authType);
Parameters
identifier
DsmlDirectoryIdentifier

A DsmlDirectoryIdentifier object that specifies the server for the connection.

credential
NetworkCredential

A NetworkCredential object that contains the Network Credentials.

authType
AuthType

The AuthType value that specifies the authentication type to use for this connection.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

identifier is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

ArgumentException

authType value is not one of the DSML supported values. DSML only supports Anonymous, Ntlm, Basic, Negotiate and digest.

InvalidEnumArgumentException

authType value is not one of the constants defined in the AuthType enumeration.

Properties

AuthType

The AuthType property contains one of the values of AuthType enumeration that specifies the authentication type.

public System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType AuthType { get; set; }
Value
AuthType

One of the values of AuthType enumeration that specifies the authentication type.

SessionId

The SessionId property contains the active session ID.

public override string SessionId { get; }
Value
String

The active session ID.

SoapActionHeader

The SoapActionHeader property contains the SOAP Action Header sent with other HTTP headers.

public string SoapActionHeader { get; set; }
Value
String

The SOAP Action Header sent with other HTTP headers.

Remarks

The default value of this property is "#batchRequest".

Timeout

The Timeout property contains the length of time, in seconds, before the DsmlSoapHttpConnection times out.

public override TimeSpan Timeout { get; set; }
Value
TimeSpan

The length of time, in seconds, before the DsmlSoapHttpConnection times out.

Methods

Abort(IAsyncResult)

The Abort method cancels the asynchronous request.

public void Abort (IAsyncResult asyncResult);
Parameters
asyncResult
IAsyncResult

An object derived from IAsyncResult that references the asynchronous request.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

asyncResult is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

ArgumentException

asyncResult was not returned by the corresponding call to stem.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.BeginSendRequest*.

BeginSendRequest(DsmlRequestDocument, AsyncCallback, Object)

The BeginSendRequest method begins asynchronously sending the specified DsmlRequestDocument object to the server.

public IAsyncResult BeginSendRequest (System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument request, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
Parameters
request
DsmlRequestDocument

The DsmlRequestDocument object to send.

callback
AsyncCallback

The AsyncCallback function.

state
Object

An Object that contains the state data for this request.

Returns
IAsyncResult

An object derived from IAsyncResult that references the asynchronous send.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

request is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

BeginSession()

The BeginSession method instructs the DSML server to start a new session.

public override void BeginSession ();
Exceptions
InvalidOperationException

Thrown when a session is already open on the connection.

DsmlInvalidDocumentException

Thrown when the XML returned from the Server in response to the BeginSession is not well-formed.

WebException

Thrown when there is a communications failure with the DSML server or when the server is out of available sessions.

Remarks

The method will block while waiting for a response from the DSML server and will time out according to the Timeout property.

EndSendRequest(IAsyncResult)

The EndSendRequest method completes an asynchronous send request.

public System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument EndSendRequest (IAsyncResult asyncResult);
Parameters
asyncResult
IAsyncResult

An object derived from IAsyncResult that contains state data for this request.

Returns
DsmlResponseDocument

A DsmlResponseDocument object that contains the results of the request.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

Thrown when asyncResult is null.

ArgumentException

Thrown if asyncResult was not returned by the current instance from a call to stem.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.BeginSendRequest*.

IOException

The request did not complete. No stream is available.

DsmlInvalidDocumentException

Thrown when the response returned by server is not valid.

WebException

Thrown when abort was previously called or when an error occurred while processing the request.

EndSession()

The EndSession method ends the session with the DSML server and clears the stem.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SessionId* property.

public override void EndSession ();
Exceptions
WebException

Thrown when there is a communications failure with the DSML server.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown when there is no open session.

Remarks

The method will block while waiting for a response from the DSML server and will time out according to the Timeout property.

If the DSML server has already terminated the session on its own, a WebException will be thrown. If the SessionId is still valid after the exception is thrown, the request never reached the server and the connection is still considered valid.

SendRequest(DirectoryRequest)

The SendRequest method sends a single DirectoryRequest object.

public override System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse SendRequest (System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest request);
Parameters
request
DirectoryRequest

A DirectoryRequest object that contains the request.

Returns
DirectoryResponse

A DirectoryResponse object that contains the results of the request.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

request is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

ErrorResponseException

The DSML server returned an error response.

DirectoryOperationException

The operation returned a failure code.

SendRequest(DsmlRequestDocument)

The SendRequest method sends a DsmlRequestDocument object to the DSML server.

public System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument SendRequest (System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument request);
Parameters
request
DsmlRequestDocument

A DsmlRequestDocument object sent to the server.

Returns
DsmlResponseDocument

A DsmlResponseDocument object that contains the results of the request.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

request is null (Nothing in Visual Basic).
